short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for moms who want to help moms. It is that simple.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We want to help moms. It is that simple. As an online community of over 300,000 moms, we see so much need. 

From moms who want to educate their children to moms who are stuck in an abusive situation and can’t get out. 

We regularly reach out to help moms we see in need from what we have… but that is not enough! There is so much need and so little we can do as two homeschooling moms. 

We need your help and that's what this extension is all about.

Let’s join hands and help these moms. 

By enabling this Chrome Extension and using it to make your purchases on popular online shopping websites, we will receive a small donation from your purchase (with no additional cost to you). 

You can make a difference, one purchase at a time. And we will share these stories of how we are helping moms on our websites!
